page.title: 18CHRISTMAS 1985
page.content:
{CHRISTMAS MEANS ....} The things I like about Christmas, The trees, the Christmas lights. And when it's snowing flakes outside, We have have big snowball fights.
The things I like about Christmas, Helpings of Christmas pud, The presents you receive and give, Cards sent with wishes good.
The things I like about Christmas, The happiness and joys, The Christmas turkey and the wine, The presents and the toys.
The things I like about Christmas, The happiness we make, The crackers have been pulled and won, We've ate the Christmas cake. {JANE COE}
